This statistic shows the total number of employees in the textile manufacturing sector in Portugal between the years 2008 and 2016 . In 2016 , the textile manufacturing sector employed a total number of 1,219 people .

In the third quarter of 2018 , the value of travel and tourism GDP contributions in Germany was 99.9 .

This statistic shows the total amount of money raised by business angel investors in Belgium from 2007 to 2016 . In 2014 , a total of 13.2 million euros was invested by business angels in Belgian companies .

In 2018 , 1,339 people were killed or seriously injured in accidents involving bicycles in the United Kingdom . In the year ending March 2018 , the number of bicycles that were killed or seriously injured on the roads increased by 14 percent from the previous year .

This statistic shows the annual production value of the accommodation and food service industry in Portugal from 2008 to 2016 . In 2016 , the production value in the accommodation and food service industry came to approximately 11.2 billion euros .

This statistic displays the number of enterprises in the rental and leasing activities sector in Croatia from 2008 to 2015 . In 2015 , there were 1,312 enterprises in the rental and leasing activities sector .
This statistic shows the total amount of investments of Cyprus in other countries from 2010 to 2016 . Investments in other countries stood at 5.3 billion euros in 2016 .

This statistic shows the total value of life insurance and pension reserves of Dutch insurance companies from 2005 to 2015 , with a forecast for 2016 to 2018 , broken down by type of insurance company . This graph illustrates the net payment of remittances from the United Kingdom ( UK ) to other countries in 2017 , by continent . In 2017 , there was a net payment of remittances to Africa to the value of 3.1 billion British pounds .

This statistic displays the distribution of the total gross domestic expenditure on research and development ( GERD ) in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2017 , by economic activity . This statistic shows the number of visits by Italian residents in the United Kingdom from 1st quarter 2015 to 2nd quarter 2018 . In the quarter ending June 2018 , approximately 2.3 million visits were made by Italian residents to the United Kingdom .

This constitutes an increase of 0.8 percent since the previous year . In 2020 , the United Kingdom 's population reached its highest recorded level of 67.3 million .

This statistic shows a ranking of the top 15 companies with the highest market capitalization in the United Kingdom as of 2013/2014 . Barclays had the highest value , followed by GlaxoSmithKline , and then BP .

The rate was 14.3 percent of white adults in 2020 , compared to 12.5 percent of Hispanic adults .

This statistic displays the distribution of the number of visits to the National Gallery in London by the number of people in the United Kingdom in 2014/2015 . The National Gallery is the most visited attraction in London with 5.94 million visits in 2014/2015 .

This statistic shows the average weekly household expenditure per person in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2021 , by gross disposable income decile group . In the first decile ( the bottom 10 percent ) , households spent an average of 204 British pounds . This was the second lowest amount spent by households in the UK , with the top 10 percent spending an average of 299 pounds per week .
This statistic shows the export value of industrial gases in Belgium from 2009 to 2020 , in thousand euros . Exports of industrial gases reached their highest value in 2020 with 409 million euros .

The statistic shows the quarterly index of industrial production ( IPI ) in the United States from the first quarter of 2012 to the second quarter of 2018 . The IPI index measures changes in the volume of industrial production in the United States , and is an important indicator of the economic performance of the country . The IPI is calculated using the national accounts , and is a key input into the GDP calculation . It is also a key measure of industrial performance , and can be used for short-term trend analysis , and long-term trend analysis .

This statistic shows the number of overnight stays from Germany to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2011 and 2013 . The number of overnight stays peaked at 2.5 million in 2011 but fell to just over 1.6 million in 2012 . In 2013 the number of overnight stays reached 1.79 million once again .

This statistic shows the most popular social networking sites among internet users in Canada as of January 2016 . According to the survey , as of January 2016 , YouTube ranked second with an average audience reach index of 73 percent among internet users in Canada .

This statistic shows the distribution of the turnover of the printing industry in Belgium in 2021 , by type of printing . In that year , 15.51 percent of printing industry 's turnover was generated through the printing of packaging . The printing of newspapers and periodicals was the leading sector with a turnover of 53.7 percent .

This statistic shows the annual production value of the manufacture of sports goods in Romania from 2008 to 2015 . In 2008 , the sports goods manufacturing production value in Romania amounted to approximately 126 million euros .

The statistic depicts the total U.S. sales of all types of bakery products from 2011 to 2020 , with a provisional estimate for 2021 . It was estimated that the total U.S. retail sales of all types of bakery products amounted to about 52.6 billion U.S. dollars in 2020 .

This statistic shows the total number of people employed in the civil engineering industry in Portugal from 2008 to 2015 . In 2015 , there were almost 32.4 thousand people employed in the civil engineering sector in Portugal .

This graph displays the share of people in the United States that would consider an electric or hybrid vehicle as their next car purchase in 2019 , broken down by gender and income . This statistic shows the annual number of visits by Italian residents to the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2014 , by gender . There was also an increase in the number of female visitors , while the number of men decreased . The peak in 2014 is likely due to a change in the exchange rate , making visits more affordable .

According to a survey conducted in 2021 in Germany , nearly two thirds of respondents stated that they have never heard of the term parking building before . Only 3 percent of respondents stated that they know the term parking building quite well .

This statistic shows the share of French people who are proud to be European in 2017 , according to age . It reveals that among people between 15 and 24 years old , 36.7 percent are very proud to be part of the European Union .

In 2021 , the number of deaths from cancer in the region of the United Kingdom ( UK ) stood at approximately 146,700 . This represents a decrease of approximately 3,581 cancer deaths from 2017 . The number of cancer deaths has been increasing steadily in the region over the past decade .

This statistic shows the results of a consumer survey on the reasons to purchase a car in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2012 . When asked to choose the most important reason to purchase a car 26 percent of respondents said it was because it was necessary for their work and 16 percent said it was necessary for their family .

This statistic depicts the revenue of industrial machinery in India from 2008 to 2012 , with a projection until 2018 . In 2010 , revenues of industrial machinery in India amounted to approximately 12.48 billion U.S. dollars .

The statistic shows the total number of employees in the textile product manufacturing industry in Norway from 2008 to 2016 . In 2015 , the manufacturing industry of textiles had a work force of approximately 52,215 employees .

This statistic shows the quarterly trend in consumer price index ( CPI ) in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from the first quarter of 2015 to the second quarter of 2021 , where a higher number means a larger decrease in the consumer price index . This graph shows the quarterly change in the CPI since the first quarter of 2015 .

This statistic shows the total number of enterprises operating in the mining and quarries sector in the Netherlands from 2009 to 2018 . In 2017 , there were 345 enterprises actively operating in the mining and quarries sector .

This statistic shows the number of visits by tourists coming from Portugal to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2016 . Around 138 thousand tourists from Portugal made day trip within the United Kingdom . In comparison , approximately 1.2 million day trip visitors arrived from Spain .

This statistic illustrates the average monthly household expenditure in the Netherlands in 2017 , by age . Household expenditure increased with the age of the household member . Households with a head aged between 30 and 39 years on average spent approximately six thousand euros more than households with a head aged between 20 and 29 years .

This statistic shows the most popular types of holiday destinations of online shoppers in the United Kingdom ( UK ) as of June 2013 , ranked by the number of holidays booked online . 38 percent of respondents had booked a sun holiday .

This statistic presents data on the share of adults with a disability who used public transportation with a personal assistant in the U.S. in 2017 , by type of assistive technology . Some 59 percent of respondents with a visual disability who used public transportation with a personal assistant reported using the subway .
In 2020 , there were 501 thousand people living with HIV in the United Republic of Tanzania . This was an decrease of 24.3 thousand people since 2010 .

According to the survey , 23 percent of respondents in the U.S. stated that they were more afraid of the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) than the 2009 H1N1 pandemic . This statistic illustrates the share of people who feel more afraid of the COVID-19 ( coronavirus ) than the 2009 H1N1 pandemic in select countries as of March 2020 .

This statistic displays the share of consumers who have bought New Look in the last month in the United Kingdom in 2020 , by gender * . During the 12 weeks ending May 23 , 2020 , 5 percent of male respondents stated that they had purchased from New Look .

This statistic displays the number of school students enrolled in primary and secondary school in the Netherlands in 2019 , by age group and type of school . The number of school students in primary school amounted to approximately 1.3 million people in 2019 , including both primary and secondary students .
This statistic shows the market share of the leading 20 beer marketers worldwide in 2016 . In 2016 , Suntory Holdings was the leading beer marketer with a market share of approximately 1.5 percent .

The statistic displays the number of Twitter followers of the Canadian Football League team the Ottawa REDBLACKS from September 2015 to September 2021 . In the most recently measured period , the Ottawa REDBLACKS had 50,489 Twitter followers . The Ottawa REDBLACKS is a Canadian Football League team that is based in Ottawa , Ontario , that was founded in 1876 .
This statistic shows the share of adults who use dating apps in the United States in 2019 , by dating app and gender . In 2019 , it was found that 35.9 percent of women used Tinder .

This statistic shows the share of people in the United Kingdom ( UK ) who are concerned about their personal data being used by government , companies or organizations in 2015 . In this year 's survey , it was found that 14 percent of the British population were very worried about their personal data being used by the government .

In 2020 , over 2,000 people were reported missing from Canada 's Ontario region . This was closely followed by the Atlantic Canada region with over 1,700 people missing . In the same year , over three thousand people were reported missing from the United States of America .

This statistic depicts the share of children who have been physically abused by their parents in Canada in 2017/2018 , by age . In 2018 , 3.5 percent of children aged 15 years old and younger reported that their parents had physically abused them at least once in the past year .

This statistic shows the number of people employed in manufacturing of refined petroleum products in France from 2008 to 2017 . The employment has varied over this period . In 2014 , 1,203 people were employed in the manufacturing of refined petroleum products in France , an increase of almost 200 people from 2008 . In 2017 , the number of people employed in this sector was approximately 1,300 .

In the first quarter of 2018 , the total amount of venture capital ( VC ) deals in the United States stood at 1,124 , down from 1,542 deals in the same period of time the previous year . The largest number of venture capital deals in the US were in New York .

This statistic shows the share of adults who have experienced difficulties when trying to write a formal email in France in 2014 . It shows that 17 percent of respondents have experienced difficulties .

This statistic shows the annual turnover of the information industry in Sweden from 2010 to 2016 , split by gender . In 2015 , 282.8 million euros were generated by female enterprises in the information industry , compared to 1.28 billion euros through enterprises of male founders . In 2016 , the turnover generated by enterprises with mixed gender founders decreased to 1.1 billion euros .

This statistic shows the total number of employees working in the air freight and passenger air transport sector in Sweden from 2008 to 2015 . In 2015 , the air freight and passenger air transport sector employed 20,419 people .

This statistic depicts how often consumers in Canada use social media platforms as of June 2015 . During the reported period , 82 percent of Canadian social network users reported to use Facebook at least once a day .

The statistic shows the number of cases of measles in Europe in 2019 , by age group . As of September 2019 , there were 251 measles cases reported among persons aged between 15 and 24 years in the Czech Republic .

In the United States , the number of people employed by the electric power generation sector has increased in recent decades . In 1989 , the sector employed some 380.4 thousand people . This figure has now decreased to some 340 thousand people , as the industry has been subject to technological developments and consolidation .

This statistic shows the results of a consumer survey conducted in the United Kingdom in 2015 . The figures show that only four per cent of respondents were very likely to pay by contactless card when paying for their groceries online .
This statistic shows the number of employees working in the publishing activities industry in the Netherlands from 2008 to 2018 . In 2017 , the publishing activities industry employed 23,213 people .

The statistic shows the average value of life insurance premiums per household in Canada in the fourth quarter of 2015 , by province . In the fourth quarter of 2015 , households in Quebec paid on average 131 Canadian dollars for life insurance .

This statistic shows the average price of eggs in the United Kingdom from 2009 to 2020 . In 2020 , the average price per kilogram was 2.16 pounds . This is an increase from 2009 when the average price per kg was 2.10 pounds .

This statistic shows the number of cases where the police have applied for bail to the Crown Court for a person to remain on bail under investigation , in England and Wales from 1st quarter 2015 to 2nd quarter 2017 . The number of such cases decreases over the time period , from 30 cases as of 2015 to 18 cases in 2016 , before increasing to 100 cases as of 2016 .
This statistic shows the annual turnover of the water transport sector in Estonia from 2008 to 2015 . In 2015 , the water transport sector produced a turnover of approximately 22.6 million euros .

This statistic shows the total number of jobs in the manufacturing industry in Sweden in 2018 , by sector . That year , the total number of employees amounted to 379,482 people . The sector with the largest number of employees was machinery & equipment manufacturing , where 115,321 jobs were counted . The total number of employees in the mining , manufacturing , and utilities sectors amounted to 1.5 million in Sweden in 2018 .

This statistic presents the most retweeted brand tweets in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2018 . In that time period , a tweet from the brand Nando's was most frequently shared . It was shared nearly 114,000 times .

In the first quarter of 2020 , the monthly average cost of living in the city of Lima in Peru amounted to approximately 1,288.13 U.S. dollars , compared to 1,118 dollars in Quito , Ecuador . This statistic illustrates the monthly cost of living in selected Latin American cities as of March 2020 , in U.S. dollars .

This statistic shows the results of a survey among Russian citizens regarding the likelihood of their support of the Russian government 's decision to hold a referendum on the abolition of the presidential term limits , held in February 2020 . 28 percent of respondents stated that they were very likely to support this initiative .

This statistic shows the number of nights spent on inland holidays in the United Kingdom ( UK ) by individuals from other EU27 countries from 2011 to 2012 , by gender . In 2012 there were 11 million nights spent on inland holidays by female visitors from EU27 countries .

This statistic shows the distribution of the total number of apartments in the United Kingdom ( UK ) as of 2016/2017 , by number of storeys . In this period there were a total of 8.38 million flats and apartments in the UK , with the majority of them being one-storey properties .

As of April 29 , 2022 , the most common cause of death in the United States was due to chronic lower respiratory diseases at 129,445 deaths . This was followed by unintentional injuries at 119,403 deaths and heart disease at 79,278 deaths .

This statistic shows the monthly household consumption expenditure per capita of medication and medical supplies in Canada from January 2020 to May 2021 . In May 2021 , Canadian households spent 45.25 Canadian dollars per capita on medication and medical supplies .

The statistic shows the distribution of venture capital fundraising in Canada in 2013 , by industry . It was reported that in 2013 , 21 percent of all venture capital funding was invested in the biotechnology industry .
The statistic shows the number of cars sold in Germany in 2020 , by car brand . Volvo led the list with almost 65 thousand units , followed by Mercedes at around 57 thousand units .

This statistic shows the distribution of the number of people in the United Kingdom ( UK ) who have had a heart attack in the last year , by ethnicity and gender . In 2017 , 34 percent of the male population of all ethnic groups have had a heart attack in the last year .

In the United States , the average price per ounce of pink diamonds ranged from 115,127 U.S. dollars to 142,578 U.S. dollars in 2017 . The average value of a carat of fancy vivid diamonds sold at auctions was the highest of all color grades , ranging from 233,727 to 323,978 U.S. dollars , with the highest value recorded for an oval fancy vivid fancy intense diamond .
This statistic shows the number of enterprises in the publishing activities sector in Portugal from 2010 to 2015 . In 2015 , there were 6,413 publishing activities enterprises in Portugal .

This statistic shows the volume of beef and veal imported to the United Kingdom ( UK ) monthly from January 2015 to July 2018 . In July 2018 , approximately 12 thousand kilograms of beef and veal were imported to the UK .

In the period from 1970 to 2019 , the price of natural gas in the United States increased significantly . In the first week of January 1970 , a therm of natural gas cost 0.70 U.S. dollars . However , by the end of the decade the price was at an average of 2.37 U.S. dollars per therm , an increase of 256 percent . The price of natural gas continued to increase in the 80 's and 90 's , reaching a record high of 5.34 U.S. dollars in 1998 .

This statistic displays the gross value added ( GVA ) from the accommodation and food service industry in Scotland in 2019 , by size of business . In 2019 , the GVA added by medium enterprises in the Scottish accommodation and food service industry was approximately 418 million British pounds .

This statistic shows the share of respondents who paid for the majority of their groceries with cash during an online survey on the grocery industry in Canada in 2013 . During the survey period , 65 percent of respondents indicated that they paid for the majority of their groceries with cash .

This statistic shows the annual personnel costs of the water transport industry in Slovakia from 2008 to 2008 . In 2008 , the water transport industry had personnel costs of approximately 50 million euros .

In 2020 , there were over 10 thousand cases of child pornography recorded by the authorities in France . This statistic illustrates the number of offenses related to child pornography recorded by the French police between 2006 and 2020 .

The statistic shows the distribution of U.S. adults who were currently married and who had a parent who had divorced , as of a 2011 survey , by their relationship status , and their parent 's divorce status . It reveals that 17 percent of U.S. adults who had a parent that divorced , were currently in a marriage and their parent had divorced .

This statistic shows the number of people in the United Kingdom ( UK ) who are currently using the internet via a mobile phone , PC , tablet or netbook from 2012 to 2013 , by frequency . In 2013 , 63 percent of respondents stated that they use the internet from a computer on a daily basis .
This statistic shows the total number of employees in the water transport industry in Lithuania from 2008 to 2015 . In 2015 , the water transport industry employed a total number of 423 people .

This statistic shows the number of deaths due to cancer in Spain between 1980 and 2018 , by type of cancer . During this 38-years period , the cancer of trachea and bronchus had the greatest number of fatalities , with 3,449 deaths in 2018 .

According to a survey conducted in March 2020 , the majority of Muslims in Russia were not in favor of banning the hijab . However , the share of respondents who agreed with the measure was 25 percent .

This statistic shows the number of enterprises operating in the mining and quarrying sector in Cyprus from 2011 to 2018 . In 2015 , there were 125 enterprises operating in the mining and quarrying sector .

The statistic shows the share of individuals with a disability in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2006 to 2016 , by employment status . In 2016 , 45.1 percent of individuals with a disability who were not in employment were inactive .

This statistic displays the opinion of adults in England on whether the benefits system encourages people to claim benefits rather than work as of April 2014 . During this period the majority of respondents , 52 percent , thought the benefits system discouraged people from taking on jobs and working for a living .

This statistic shows the percentage of adults in the U.S. who had a disability and who had difficulty with one or more basic ADL 's in 2016 , by age group . In that year , about 22.4 percent of U.S. adults aged 65 and over with a self-reported disability had difficulty in one or more of the six activities measured in the ADL ( activities of daily living ) .

This statistic shows the share of individuals in the United Kingdom ( UK ) who used the internet to look up information or advice on a medical condition as of 2013 ( split by gender ) . In this year , 33 percent of women and 28 percent of men in the UK used the internet for health-related information .

This statistic presents the number of enterprises in the rental and leasing activities industry in Croatia from 2010 to 2018 . In 2018 , there were 4,040 enterprises in the rental and leasing activities industry .

This statistic depicts the distribution of mobile phone usage in Belgium as of February 2015 , broken down by mobile phone brand . During this period , 74 percent of Belgian smartphone users were using a Nokia Lumia .

This statistic depicts a forecast of the number of cases of COVID-19 in the United Kingdom from February 2020 to August 2021 . It is expected that around 2.1 million cases of COVID-19 will be diagnosed during the time period .

This statistic shows the number of people who died from diphtheria , measles or rubella infections in Europe and North America from 2007 to 2016 , by gender . In 2016 , 13 people died from infections of measles , mumps and rubella . This figure is higher when compared to the number of deaths in 2015 .

According to a survey carried out in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in February 2020 , 32 percent of respondents stated that the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) would have a significant impact on the effectiveness of government regulations . In contrast , only four percent of respondents expected the coronavirus to not have any significant impact on the effectiveness of government regulations .

The statistic shows the number of Facebook friends per user worldwide as of March 2018 , sorted by age group . As of the measured period , Facebook users aged 40 to 65 years had on average around 400 friends .

This statistic shows the number of tourism visits made from Canada to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 1st quarter 2015 ( Q1 ) and 1st quarter 2020 . Inbound tourist visits to the United Kingdom from Canada amounted to 1.28 million in the first quarter of 2020 . This is a significant increase from 103,832 tourist visits recorded during the first quarter of 2015 .

This statistic shows the opinion of consumers on how the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) outbreak will impact their holiday plans in 2020 and 2021 . According to the survey , 44 percent of respondents were not planning to take any trips because of the coronavirus , whereas 10 percent were planning to travel abroad .

This statistic shows the export volume of solar power generating systems in India from FY 2012 to FY 2017 . In FY 2017 , the export of solar power generating systems from India had decreased to approximately 30.2 thousand units from approximately 56.1 thousand units in FY 2016 .

This statistic shows the number of solar photovoltaic products exported from the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2011 to 2017 . The figures refer to goods entering the European Union , EU , entry between EU and EU countries . In 2017 , a total of 32,018 units of photovoltaic products were exported .

This statistic shows the number of Facebook fans of the fashion brand Zara in Spain as of 20 most popular pages , from January to December 2015 . With an average of more than 522,200 likes , the page of Zara 's flagship store in Madrid was the most popular Facebook page of the Spanish brand , followed closely by the page of Zara's online shop with 515,488 likes .

The statistic shows the gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Malawi from 2016 to 2019 , with projections up until 2026 . Domestic gross product ( GDP ) of Malawi amounted to about 15.16 billion U.S. dollars in 2019 .

This statistic displays the death rate due to respiratory diseases in the EU-28 countries in 2016 with and without experience of chronic heart failure . The death rate from respiratory diseases in the EU-28 countries in 2016 amounted to 32.1 deaths per 100,000 population with experience of chronic heart failure compared to 114.5 deaths per 100,000 population without experience of chronic heart failure .
This statistic shows the number of cases of cholera in Europe in 2015 , by country . As of September 2015 , the number of cholera cases in Italy amounted to 115 .
This statistic shows the life expectancy at birth in Iran from 2009 to 2019 . In 2019 , the average life expectancy at birth in Iran was 74.91 years .

This statistic illustrates the direct employment in the manufacturing sector of the chemical industry in the Czech Republic from 2008 to 2015 . In the period of consideration , employment figures fluctuated . In 2015 , approximately 17.4 thousand people were employed in this sector in Czechia .

This statistic displays the number of deaths due to malignant neuro-endocrine and other digestive tract and liver cancers in the United Kingdom from 2012 to 2014 , by age . In 2014 , 4,041 males aged between 30 and 39 died from these cancers . This is the highest number of deaths among any age group .

This statistic shows the number of employees in the rubber products manufacturing industry in Finland from 2008 to 2016 . In 2016 , the number of employees in the rubber products manufacturing industry in Finland was estimated at approximately 1,238 people .

This statistic shows the distribution of domestic flights by fly-cruise itineraries worldwide as of June 2014 , by cruising days . During the survey period , it was found that 51 percent of domestic flights had cruising days ranging between seven and ten .

This statistic shows the share of adults who have ever used the internet for the following purposes worldwide as of April 2014 . During this period of time , 69 percent of internet users reported that they use the web for online banking .

This statistic shows the results of a survey on the share of consumers who have used a tablet PC in the last 3 months in Germany in 2014 . During the survey period it was found that 52 percent of respondents had used a tablet PC within the last 3 months .

This statistic presents the average cost per click on Google AdWords in the United Kingdom ( UK ) for businesses as of January 2018 , by region . It was found that the cost per click in London averaged at 1.31 British pounds ( 0.08 US dollars ) in that month , the highest average cost in any region in the UK .

The statistic shows ECS-Gamerscore ratio in the United Kingdom ( UK ) as of 2014 , by gender . The ECS-Gamerscore ratio of male and female gamers in the UK was 20.1 and 16.4 in 2014 . The ECS stands for `` engagement , content , and share '' . The ECS is a measure for the value of social content .

This statistic shows the crude oil export volume from Norway from 2009 to 2020 . It shows that the crude oil export volume from Norway increased overall over this period . In 2020 , crude oil exports reached some 115.6 million tons .

The statistic shows the projected share of the adult population worldwide with no access to internet from 2010 to 2013 , by region . By 2013 , it was expected that 4.1 percent of adults in Africa will have no access to the internet .
This statistic shows the annual personnel costs of the printing industry in Denmark from 2008 to 2016 . In 2015 , the printing industry had personnel costs of approximately 290.3 million euros .

This statistic displays the results of a survey on the usage frequency of the social platform Reddit among Generation X individuals in Great Britain as of June 2018 . Of Gen X individuals , 17 percent reported using the social platform Reddit once or twice a week .

This statistic displays the gross value added ( GVA ) from the water transport industry in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2008 to 2014 . The value added from water transport in 2008 was estimated to be 465.4 million British pounds , by 2014 the figure had risen to around 522.8 million British pounds .

This statistic shows the annual turnover of the publishing activities sector in Romania from 2009 to 2016 . In 2016 , the publishing activities sector produced a turnover of approximately 700.9 million euros .

This statistic shows the share of children with asthma in Canada who had been diagnosed with their condition as of 2005 , by region . It is estimated that 22 to 24 percent of children with asthma in Ontario have been diagnosed with the disease .
The statistic shows the distribution of the total workforce in the United States by employers , workers , and unpaid family workers . In 2020 , 93.4 percent of the U.S. workforce were workers .

This statistic shows the total annual greenhouse gas emissions including international aviation in Luxembourg from 2008 to 2017 . In 2017 , the greenhouse gas emissions amounted to 9.15 million tons of CO2 equivalent .

This statistic shows the distribution of the electricity generation mix in Italy in 2020 , by generation source . During the period under review , about 38 percent of the electricity generated in Italy in 2020 came from nuclear energy .

The timeline shows the average price per kilogram of apples in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2004 to 2020 . The prices have fluctuated over the years , but the average price has been around 10 British pounds per kilogram in 2020 .

This statistic shows the number of cases where the police in England and Wales were involved in in relation to cybercrime in 2011 , broken down by type of offense . In that year , the police were involved in 21,291 cases of computer misuse . This was more than twice the number of cases involving the misuse of other forms of technology , with 9,189 cases being investigated in that time .
The statistic depicts Converse ’s global revenue from fiscal years 2005 to 2020 . In the fiscal year 2020 , Converse generated global revenue of about 2.18 billion U.S. dollars .
This statistic shows the net sales of the company Valeo in 2018 , by region . In 2018 , the net sales of Valeo in the region of Europe amounted to around 9.69 billion euros .

This statistic shows the share of adults using the internet in Italy in 2014 , by age and gender . According to data , 83.1 percent of Italian men aged between 25 to 44 years had internet access , compared to 67.6 percent of Italian women in the same age group .

This statistic shows the average age of first time marriages in the United Kingdom from 1970 to 2019 . The average age for women to marry for the first time increased from 25.2 years old in 1970 to 29.2 years old in 2019 .

This statistic shows the share of individuals who used social media during the past month in France from 2015 to 2018 , by age group . It reveals that the percentage of people aged between 15 and 24 years old using social media has been constantly decreasing in the period under observation , reaching 55 percent in 2018 .

This statistic shows the number of visits from France to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2016 , by gender . The number of female visitors from France increased from 973 thousand in 2013 to 1.35 million in 2015 . In 2016 the number of male visitors increased to 2.02 million .

The COVID-19 pandemic in the U.S. is expected to negatively impact the global economy in the coming year , with the U.S. accounting for 17 percent of the global gross domestic product ( GDP ) . This statistic shows the projected impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on the world economy by sector .

According to a survey by Rakuten Insight in South Korea in March 2018 , around 75 percent of respondents aged between 20 and 29 years stated that they used the social network Instagram for personal reasons only . Only five percent of those surveyed said that they were using the platform for business purposes .

This statistic shows the global share of the leading banks in the network banking business as of 2013 . At that time , Bank of America was the leading bank in the network banking segment with 4.2 percent of the worldwide market .

This statistic shows the share of the population that are aware of the health benefits of physical exercise in Great Britain from 2011 to 2018 . The level of awareness increased from the 2011 survey , when 61 percent of respondents reported that they knew that physical exercise was good for their health , to 67 percent in 2018 .

In 2021 , the highest share of individuals who owned a smart speaker in Mexico was found in the age group of 18 to 24 years at nearly 33 percent . The lowest share of smart speaker owners was observed in the age group of 65 years and older at only 5.3 percent .
